section.title: Exercise: A custom part renderer
section.para: In this exercise you create a custom part renderer which renders all parts with an SWT browser widget.

warning.para: This example might not work on Linux, as the SWT browser widget sometimes has issues on Linux.

section.para: Extend the MyRendererFactory to the following to use your own part renderer.
Run your application and test that every part is now rendered as browser.

note.para: Currently all parts show the same URL, but you could extend your renderer to access for example tags at the parts to determine the URLs which should be used.

textobject.phrase: Using a Browser Renderer for the Parts

warning.para: After finishing the test, remove the rendererFactoryUri property from the plugin.xml file of your application plug-in, so that your application works again as before.
